body_html: A Swift frontend, especially for simply running graphs for inference on mobile would be great. I don't know of current plans to provide one, so feel free to dive in. Since our exact plans on accepting external contributions are still in flux, it would be a good idea to check in with the discuss mailing list with a draft of the code ahead of time to figure out where it should live exactly.

body: A Swift frontend, especially for simply running graphs for inference on mobile would be great. I don't know of current plans to provide one, so feel free to dive in. Since our exact plans on accepting external contributions are still in flux, it would be a good idea to check in with the discuss mailing list with a draft of the code ahead of time to figure out where it should live exactly.
